page.title: 17Wolverhampton Pre-Education
page.content: At the age of two and a half years I attended a play group at a community centre.It was not compulsory but the aim was to be able to mix with others. One went in the mporning and played with toys like lego,toy building bricks,a dolls house and slide. I stayed there until I was three and a half years old. I then went to a nursery school until I was four and a half years old. There I made many friends with whom I still play. On my first day I wasn't shy and didn't cry like most children because I had been to a playgroup. One either went for the morning or for the afternoon. There were many toys to play with and nearly everyday we learnt a little about reading and writing. We also had a piece of apple and a drink of milk while being read a story. By Joane Chell.
